tool.name: tool_19
tool.displayname: Import Simple Features from Well Known Text

param.name: WKT
param.dialogReference:
WKT String

Long text

Import WKT from string instead of file. Just paste the WKT.

tool.summary: Imports vector data from 'well known text' (WKT) simple features format. This import tool assumes that all features in a file are of the same type. Instead of importing from file(s), the tool also supports the conversion from a string provided with the 'WKT String' parameter. References: Open Geospatial Consortium

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
